ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.2_0: At that time the monks from the group of six were misbehaving, but when a legal procedure was being done against any one of them, they would object.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.3_0: the Sangha had gathered on some business.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.4_0: The monks from the group of six were busy making robes and so they gave their consent to one among them.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.6_0: When the monks saw that only one monk from the group of six had come, they did a legal procedure against him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.7_0: When he returned to the monks from the group of six,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.10_0: “It did a legal procedure against me.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.11_0: “We didn’t give our consent for that.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.13_0: If we had known that a procedure would be done against you, we wouldn’t have given our consent.”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.14_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Udāyī,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.15_0: “How can the monks from the group of six give their consent to legitimate legal procedures and then criticize them afterwards?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.16_0: “Is it true, monks, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.19_0: “... Foolish men, how can you give your consent to legitimate legal procedures and then criticize them afterwards?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.20_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.21_0: “And, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:1.22.1_0: ‘If a monk gives his consent to legitimate legal procedures, and then criticizes them afterwards, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.1.4_0: ...The monk who has been given the full ordination by a unanimous Sangha through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.1.6_0: a legal procedure consisting of getting permission, a legal procedure consisting of one motion, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and one announcement, a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements; done according to the Teaching, according to the Monastic Law, according to the Teacher’s instruction. This is called a “legitimate legal procedure”.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.1.7_0: If he gives his consent, and then criticizes the procedure, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.1_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, and he perceives it as such, and he criticizes it after giving his consent, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.2_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but he is unsure of it, and he criticizes it after giving his consent, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.3_0: If it is a legitimate legal procedure, but he perceives it as illegitimate, and he criticizes it after giving his consent, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.4_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but he perceives it as legitimate, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.5_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.2.6_0: If it is an illegitimate legal procedure, and he perceives it as such, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.1_0: there is no offense for him.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.2_0: if he knows that the legal procedure was illegitimate, done by an incomplete assembly, or done against one who did not deserve it;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.4_0: if he is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc79:2.3.5_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on obstructing a legal procedure, is finished.
